## astro auth login

Login to Astronomer services

### Synopsis

Login to Astronomer services

```
astro auth login [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --domain string     pass the cluster domain for authentication
  -h, --help              help for login
  -r, --registry string   pass a custom project registry for authentication
```
